{{Infobox battle item |name = Mystic Water |image = [[File:Mystic Water.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Mystic Water''. |location =
*[[Mystic Water#Dungeons|Dungeons]] }} == Description == The '''Mystic Water''' is a type of held item that can only be equipped to [[File:Water_Type_icon.png|30px]] Water type Pokémon. == Details == Raises attack of the Pokémon holding the item by 10%. == Acquisition == ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Items}} {{LootItem|Whirl Islands|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Weather Institute|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Sea Spirit's Den|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Brooklet Hill|Legendary}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
